name: C++
desc: C++ is a versatile, high-performance programming language often used for system/application development.

name: Java
desc: Java is an object-oriented, class-based language known for its portability and widespread use in web and mobile applications.

name: Python
desc: Python is a versatile, easy-to-read programming language with a broad range of applications, including web development and data analysis.

name: Python3
desc: Python is a versatile, easy-to-read programming language with a broad range of applications, including web development and data analysis.

name: C
desc: C is a foundational, procedural programming language commonly used for system-level programming and embedded systems.

name: C#
desc: C# is a modern, object-oriented language developed by Microsoft, widely used for building Windows applications and web services.

name: JavaScript
desc: JavaScript is a dynamic scripting language primarily used for web development to enhance interactivity and create dynamic content.

name: TypeScript
desc: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, making it more scalable and maintainable for large codebases.

name: PHP
desc: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development, particularly for building dynamic web pages.

name: Swift
desc: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language developed by Apple for building iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS applications.

name: Kotlin
desc: Kotlin is a concise, expressive programming language interoperable with Java, commonly used for Android app development.

name: Dart
desc: Dart is a client-optimized programming language used for building cross-platform mobile, web, and server applications.

name: Go
desc: Go, also known as Golang, is a statically typed language developed by Google, known for its simplicity and efficiency in building scalable systems.

name: Ruby
desc: Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language known for its elegant syntax and focus on developer happiness.

name: Scala
desc: Scala is a versatile programming language that combines object-oriented and functional programming paradigms, often used for scalable systems.

name: Rust
desc: Rust is a systems programming language that prioritizes safety and performance without sacrificing control over low-level details.

name: Racket
desc: Racket is a general-purpose, multi-paradigm programming language often used for language-oriented programming.

name: Erlang
desc: Erlang is a concurrent, functional programming language designed for building highly scalable and fault-tolerant systems.

name: Elixir
desc: Elixir is a dynamic, functional language built on the Erlang VM, known for its scalability and fault-tolerant features.
